Still, if she can feel you while not knowing of your presence, there's nothing to fear if she knows you're there right?

-"Fine by me doctor. Just tell me what to do and I'll help you with that."- Sandra's booming response echoes on you. She sounded pretty sure of what was to come, so there's your assurance of her cooperation.

You begin to explain her involvement -"OK Sandra, first I'll need you to turn on and set the lights on your seat, then put me on your tongue along with this small brush over here."- where you point to a brush that's at least twice your size, but still light enough for you to carry it with two hands. -"Since this is a first time, I'll only do a bit of cleaning, along with a routine examination, so don't worry about drills or the like. Still, I expect you to keep your mouth open during the whole time. If you have to close it, at least don't keep it that way for too long. And for everything you hold dear if you have to swallow at least put me out in advance. I'm a dentist, not a pill. When I'm over I will let you know by exiting your lips. And remember: breathe trough your nose, don't talk, and no sudden movements."- you conclude your explanation.

-"As I said Mr. Smith, you have nothing to worry about. In fact, I think we both are going to enjoy this."- Sandy said, as she started to turn the lights hanging low above the seat and focusing them on one spot. To some extent, she was right, she was clearly looking forward to it, and you were starting to get excited over the prospect of having a different perspective of your job, of going personally into her mouth and give her proper care of it; even the risks of a mishap sound exciting, so as long as they don't actually kill you.

-"All set doctor."- Sandra said, taking you from the table with one hand. She laid herself down in the reclined table, and as she rested her head under the gleaming lights, she took you forwards to your newest work station. She had laid her head so you could still stand while working, though with a bit of incline towards her neck. As she held you just outside her crimson tinted lips, she opened her mouth, her sweetened warm breath assailing you immediately, so you could get a proper first glance.

Above you, behind her upper lip, lie her upper row of teeth, with each one hanging not too high above you, so it will be easy to clean and inspect them without too much trouble. The front row is mostly clean, though it has some yellow spots; while the farther ones, at least from here, look a bit grimy. Below them was her bumpy tongue you had become an acquaintance earlier, now extended above her bottom lip and teeth, expecting your arrival. Even when she didn't get to eat her lollipop, Sandra's tongue was a shade too red to be her usual clear pink, she must have had another candy before entering your office. As with her upper row, her bottom teeth were mostly clean on the front, while the back ones had a thin layer of filth on them. -Could she at least brush herself before coming? It would save time to us both.- you sigh. Beyond the reddish tongue, you can see the point where her mouth ends and her throat begins, with her round uvula hanging above the hole, swaying slightly with every breath she took, the place where you shouldn't be getting anywhere near.

Taking your first step onto her tongue, you almost slipped on it. Getting to transverse this muscle is a little tricky, but nothing that can't be done. You get to the center of her mouth when you see an object coming in from outside. The narrow brush is delivered by Sandra's hand next to you, almost pushing you backwards. You grab it with your two hands and start rubbing out the excess filth on Sandra's teeth, starting on the front rows.

*Scrub* *Scrub* You clean her rows of teeth up and down, up and down, until you are finally over with the front row. However, you notice an increase in humidity on her tongue, accompanied by an increase in its inclination. You start feeling like you're sliding.. towards her throat!

You dare not to open your eyes, lest the last sight of your life be that one of you going down her esophagus.

You open your eyes expecting to see blackness, only to see that you're suspended in the air, still clinging to your brush, with Sandra's gaping maw in front of you as her tongue retracts all the remaining saliva to her throat, where her tonsils follow as she swallows.

Confused, you heard Sandra's voice boom in front of you. -"Like that?"- she says, rising you so you're making eye contact. -"See doctor? You weren't in any danger, I just wanted to tease you a bit! You should have seen yourself!."- she let out a chuckle, while you shouted out an H-bomb worth of curses to her, not caring that she couldn't even hear them. -"Right.. Sorry, next time I'll take you out in advance."- she apologizes, wiping a little tear of joy in her eye and putting you back in her mouth.

125122111.content:
It was just too sudden, you couldn’t stand a chance, try and thrash all you might you merely got slimed with slobber instead of her attention, and once the trembling hill of your patient’s tongue was raised to empty your miniscule body into her gullet, it was all over for you. Darkness encroached your cramped quarters all too quick, and before you could even grip on anything for support, you heard your death bell ring in her swallow, and in a single innocuous gulp your back lurched over the edge and sent you spelunking into her throat.

At your new size, the tunnel didn’t even constrict around you, but rather throbbed smoothly so as to ease the passage for the spit blob you were encased in. Desperate to gain any sort of leverage, your frustration only peaks as your limbs are all too burdened by the slime to lift swiftly, much less impair your descent, and even when you do manage to break and touch down on the chute, the surface is just too smooth and slippery and wavy to get a hold. All your efforts are reduced to grasping whatever slick veiny wall you can reach as you hopelessly fall down the gullet of your blonde MILF of a patient, cursing your predicament all the way down to her mature, toned depths.

Gluk…

It feels like you’re plummeting so fast, and yet your descent is so drawn out at the same time, and it’s not at all because of your active objection to becoming the smartest lunch that Sandra would ever have, but rather because the woman’s throat idling your passage; one moment you’re stuck and entrenched by the slick walls surrounding you, and then plop, those very same muscles constrict and drag you down another inch or so. One after another the sounds of her body pass you by loudly and then muffle again, as if waving you goodbye on your way to doom, first the wheeze of her lungs, then the soft beat of her heart, and finally the one that welcomes you to your fate, the sloppy, sloshing, bubbling gurgle of her stomach awaiting your arrival.

Arriving at the end of your fateful ride your liquid vessel slows down as it meets and slides down an uneven slope, placing you higher on edge like the unwilling passenger pleading to stop the roller coaster just before the big plunge. There was only one other noise below that boiling mess, the wettest, squaquiest squelch that you ever heard in your life, followed by the gastric fiesta underneath turning up its volume tenfold. A warm, acrid breeze wafted up to your strained nostrils, instantly overpowering the semi-sweet breath leftover from Sandra’s maw with its sickening scent, a miasma no doubt byproduct of the digestion of a hefty lunch already in progress. You didn’t even get the chance to plug your nose before your slimy car dropped into the swirling vat cooking below; then, after a brief fall through the desnse stench, you splatted back-first into a quaking bed of mush.

That’s right, splatted, the surface wasn’t thin enough for you to breach with your puny weight alone, and although you still dented a spot on the sludge, it was just enough to cushion your fall, giving you enough time to behold your new surroundings and wish that the fall had broken your neck instead. That breath a moment ago was but a sample of the true horrors stewing in a middle-aged mother’s gastric course; immediately the smell and heat storm your senses and make you retch in recoil, but that’s only the tip of it. Your attempts at getting afoot of this whirling swamp are thwarted by the lack of stable grounding, the closest being the bile-greased chunks of her lunch that slam with you every now and then from the churning. The slick, pasty quick-muck sticks to your every surface it can reach, and worst of all is the thin frothy film leaking from it that makes short work of your coat and clothes in no time, soon to begin working on boiling your skin.

Agony quickly spreads through your body as you writhe back and forth trapped by the mush, but like any other resistance you’ve put so far, it simply won’t change your fate as Sandra’s speck snack. Your restless thrashing serves only to lather you in a thicker coat of the acid slime, and your screams just bounce off the walls while the bubbling, gurgling and groaning snuff out your pleas. It’s not long until the stewy barf broth enters your mouth and all you can do is hope that Sandra hears you gargling on her vomit for help while you still have a handsome face to save.

---

Sandra grew bothered when she couldn’t feel the dentist’s steps along her gumline, idly passing the moments by counting every second with the impatient tapping of her finger; but after nearly a full minute without input and the following sweep of her tongue across her mouth returned with nothing but the small brush he was working with, she was all but certain that Dr. Smith wasn’t in her mouth anymore. Well, it’s not like he could just up and vanish in thin air, she simply mustn’t have noticed him getting out, maybe he had to come out to catch a breath or something.

He wasn’t the only one that needed a break though, keeping her mouth wide open without a brace and flooded with excess drool took a toll on her comfort, so with some careful lingual skills and molar maneuvering, she slipped the toothbrush out of her mouth, putting it aside for the moment, then looked down to her chin to see how far her sneaky little runaway dentist had gotten.

Unable to locate him anywhere on her being, Sandra cocked her eye at the doctor’s ninja-like swiftness, though she would really appreciate some feedback now. She was extra careful as she got up from the seat, cupping her hands close to her jaw so that she would catch him in case she missed him and he tumbled off her, and although she came up empty handed, she didn’t suspect anything afoul at all. Why should she? It’s not like she ate him or something, she would know!

“What’s the matter, doctor? My breath’s too strong? I took a mint before coming in!”

Cheery and bouncy in her tone as always, Sandra then stepped out from the examining chair and took a moment to stretch her back as she looked down at the equally vacant seat, lined only by the wrinkles of her weight and nothing else; or no one else, for that matter.

“Doc? Doc Smith, where are you?”

On the head rest? Nope.

By the handrail? No.

Near the foot rest? Take a guess.

Gasp. “Oh my god…” Sandra whispered under her breath, clenching her fists; “I can’t believe it… he…”

Left and right, no matter where the increasingly baffled woman aimed her view to, her shrunken physician still didn’t turn up anywhere on the chair, or on the instrument tray on the table next to it, or anywhere close for that matter, which worked as enough proof to confirm her suspicions.

“He left! He actually left in the middle of my exam!”

Steam built from Sandra’s ears upon reaching her conclusion, and who could blame her? This was so unprofessional from Dr. Smith! Just leaving in smoke like that while his work wasn’t even half done! How rude!

After a moment of venting her indignity, the worked-up woman sighed and took her seat again; He must have left to go attend a call or get something or whatever, she figured, I’ll just chew him out a bit when he’s back for leaving without saying anything, maybe give him another scare trip to the back of my mouth! A light chuckle escaped her at the callback picture of the balled-up doctor all jittery and helpless, clutching the small brush he clung to for dear life some minutes ago; it was so cute watching him like a small mouse shivering in the paw of a cat! A mild grin stretched her lips at that thought, a part of her really cherished being the big mean kitty in that charade.

Five more minutes of staring at the ceiling later, Sandra’s patience was wearing thin; not that she was the best tempered woman to begin with, but come on, he would be done by now if he didn’t get cold feet all of a sudden. Nothing to do but think on her day and listen to the clock tick away for minutes to end, until a low groan broke the silent march of time for her; the roar followed on reflex by an acknowledging glance down on herself and a soft rub on her diligent tummy, as if rewarding the one thing in the whole room that actually did its work; but even that got old after a couple of minutes, she was falling asleep already! That’s it, unlike some people Sandra was a busy woman, with a tight schedule today that couldn’t be delayed by her dentist deciding that her appointment was the right time to take a coffee break. Picking up her purse, the impatient mother left to the reception, and before she could even file a complaint, what a surprise, the desk girl was gone as well, an ‘Out to lunch’ place holding her over the counter.

Hmph! Nothing but slackers here today!

Storming off from the office, Sandra left grunting all the way back to her car and sworn off any further visits she planned with Dr. Smith in the foreseeable future. Just as she was about to take out the key, she found the lollipop that she put away since her procedure began, still wad up back in its wrapper. Eh, it’s not like he’s around to tell me to cut the candy. Scoffing under her breath, she resumed her sucking on the sweet with delight and got into her ride, soon leaving for her next appointment for the day.

Had the hasty woman put more thought into the possibilities of her dentist’s whereabouts, she could have considered that maybe he hadn’t left her mouth whatsoever, or his sudden career swap to the field of nutrition and later colonoscopy, but by then, there wasn’t much she could do for the shrunken doctor except to schedule their next appointment in her bathroom.

151221111.content: Does it shoot a growth ray, or a shrink ray?
151221111.title: Yes!

1512211111.title: The blast grows who it hits!

choices: She starts mess with the shrink ray.
152.content:
Before you have more time to think, Jen walks in. She is your newest patient and this is the first tine that you are seeing her. The first thing you notice is the snell, Jen set up an appointment, complaining that she has a terrible foot odor. You have had other patients with bromodosis, but she is the worst case you have smelled. The aroma of Cheetos and vinegar is filling your nose, making you gag.

         All you can see are her black sandals coming for you. As you prepare to be stepped on, you see her right foot stop right in front of you, before she takes a seat. She undoes the buckles on her sandals, allowing them to fall freely to the floor, just missing you. You can see a number printed on the iside of the heel, size fifteen.

         You look up at her massive feet, a size fifteen is sizable enough, but at your current size they are massive. She is curling her long, slender toes, her soles wrinkling each and every time, humming out of boredom. She starts to look around, wondering where you are.
152.title: A Bad Case of Stinky Feet

choices: She uses the shink ray to return you to normal size
She keeps you as a pet
1521.content:
You stand about five feet from where Jen is sitting, jumping up and down as you wave your arms wildly. You shout at the top of your lungs, hoping she will notice you.

         Jen finally looks down, a confused look on her face as she notices you. "Doctor Smith?"

         She pcks you up and places you on a counter, her face close to you as she asks, "What happened to you?"

         You explain to Jen about the srink ray and how it went off. "Can you help me?"
1521.title: Hope

choices: Grows 15% more (each subsequent growth spurt is doubled
15211.content:
Jen walks over to the shrink ray as you explain it to her. "There should be a switch on it it. You should only need to set it to grow and hit the red button."

         -"Like this?" Jen asks as she hits the button.

         The beam from the shrink ray hits you as you slowly grow from one inch to two inches. You feel relieved as you continue to grow, as you can't wait to return to your normal height. As you hit six inches, the beam stops and the machine starts to spark. an arc of elictricity hits Jen causing her to hit the floor begore the machine starts to smoke. Your heart sinks as you realize that you are stuck at this size now.

         As Jen gets up, rubbing her head, something seems off about her. Her clothes loom tight on her. The bottom of her pants no longer reach her ankles, but instead are raised up. Her midriff is exposed a bit as her shirt has shrunk. No not shrunk.

         "Jen, how tall are you?" you ask.

         "Five foot six," Jen answers.

         Looking at a point of refereence, you start to shake your head in disbelief. "Well, now it looks like that you are in inch shy of being six feet tall."

         Jen jaw drops as she looks down at herself, unable to believe it herself. She looks at you, worried as she is starting to grow again.
15211.title: Backfire

choices: Jen begins slapping your sandal against her heel, and notices your presence
Jen lifts your sandal up to her level, and you fall onto the examining table
1522.content:
You watch as Jen’s feet scrunch and swing above you, frozen by fear and indecision. Before you can react, the immense toes reach down and clasp around the faux leather straps of her sandal. You suddenly decide to jump onto the foam insole, in the hopes of drawing Jen’s attention or at least riding the shoe up to the examining table. Without stopping to consider how bad of an idea this is, you leap onto the sandal and tumble under the arch of Jen’s foot.

The combined smell of the foot and the shoe it had so recently occupied was downright deadly. The wrinkled sole above is imposing enough to take up much of your field of vision. The foam insole you lie on is soaked in sweat.

Suddenly, the shoe, with you in tow, rises up, clutched between Jen’s long toes. She begins slapping the opposite sandal against her heel, shaking you to the bone displaying the sheer strength even her toes possess.
1522.title: She picks up her shoes.

choices: Jen decides to try helping you, even if she doesn’t really know how to operat
Jen is a little sadistic, and makes the little man do what she wants.
15221.content:
Without warning, the sweat-slicked sandal beneath you begins to buck and jerk at the whim of Jen’s toes. Disoriented by the random, violent motion, you do nothing to prevent being slammed into her waiting foot.
For a moment you’re pressed between the relatively unyielding foam of the insole and the plush, clammy underside of Jen’s foot. You sink into the rubbery flesh and are immediately plastered by its thin coating of drying sweat. When the sandal retreats, your body remains stuck to the ceiling of footskin for a moment before you peel away.
The sandal bucks beneath you once again, and the trial repeats itself. This time, you are pressed into Jen’s sole much less intensely. The mercy is lost on you; by now you’ve processed the otherworldly smell and taste. It is a confusing cocktail of salty, bitter, and sour, assaulting your senses on many fronts.
You’re spared your next meeting with the titanic sole of Jen’s foot, and are instead met by her reaching fingers. Each appendage is twice as long as your body, further driving home your insignificance. The enormous hand warps around your starkly fragile twig of a body and lifts it up at a dizzying speed.
You stop moving and close your eyes, waiting for your head to clear. When it finally does, you look up to see the Jen’s wide-eyed face, framed by her obsidian hair, and animated by a newfound curiosity.
15221.title: Found, for better or worse

choices: Jen only manages to shrink you further, to a mere eight of an inch.
Jen’s meddling has confused the machine, you end up merging with her sandals
152211.content:
“Oh my god! Are you, like, real?!” Jen asks. Though she isn’t yelling, her voice is loud enough to your tiny ears so as to be painful. Jen notices your discomfort and apologizes.
You explain your misfortune, as best you can. As you try to explain what she should do to help you, Jen interrupts you, as if she hadn’t heard the last part of your explanation.
“Oh, you poor thing! Here, let me try to change you back.” She points to the beeping hulk of the Shrinkomatic. “That’s the shrinking machine, right?”
You nod and prepare to explain how to work the machine, but Jen acts before you can do anything. She deposits you on the examining table, somewhat less gently than you’d like, and rushes to the machine. She mutters to herself as she pokes around, trying to figure out how the contraption works. She seems genuinely concerned for your well-being, but there was no way she would be able to reverse your shrinking without a detailed explanation. You try yelling and waving to get her attention, but Jen is far too engrossed in the machine to notice.
After fiddling with the settings for a while, Jen presses an unmarked button on the machine. You black out.
152211.title: Well-meaning mistakes

choices: You manage to keep all of Jen’s foot filth down. She keeps you as her slave
152212.content:
“Hey little guy!” Jen murmurs. “What were you doing down there?”
Relieved that you’ve finally been discovered, you begin to explain what’s happened to you.
“What’s that? I’m sorry, it’s hard to make out what you’re saying down there.” A hint of a grin plays across Jen’s face. You begin to worry, but begin to explain anyway, louder this time.
“You know what? I think you’re just too small to be heard little man! In fact, you’re too small for just about anything. I bet you’d even have trouble surviving out in the great big world without someone bug to protect and provide for you.”
This was getting more and more worrisome. You begin to struggle against Jen’s grip, but her fingers prove more than a match for your meager strength.
“How about this, little man. I’ll keep you with me, feed you and keep you safe. All you have to do in return is anything I say!” Jen is outright beaming now, tickled by the idea of owning a tiny slave guy. You try to escape, but nothing seems to work. You yell your opinion of this arrangement up to her.
“Oh, that’s great!” Jen responds, giggling. “I love it when things work out in everyone’s favor.” With that, she deposits you on the examining table, and quickly follows by thudding her feet into place in front of you.
“For your first duty go ahead and clean my feet, with your tongue of course. This asshole of a doctor decided not to show up so I guess his problem is now yours! Oh, and remember how I told you I’d feed you? Well consider this your first meal!” Jen wiggles her toes, wafting the acrid stench of her unwashed feet toward you.
Jen’s size 15 soles would have been notably large at a normal size. Now, they stood easily more than ten times your height. Her big toe alone was large enough to smother you if she wanted. Seeing no other course of action, you comply.
You start at the heels. The taste of her feet is bitter and salty, given a gritty texture by dirt and flakes of skin. Jen forces you to scrape away and eat the callouses that pepper the heel and ball of her foot, and clear away the film of sweat that plasters her sole. As you finish with the sole, you are even more sickened to realize that you are beginning to feel full.
“Don’t forget the toesies,” giggles Jen from above. She angles her foot down so that her spread toes are accessible to you. The smell worsens, and you begin to cough before getting back to work.
The lumps of dirt and sock lint between her toes are plentiful, and you find yourself having to spelunk deep between her slender toes to finish clearing them out to her satisfaction. The pocket between her pinky and fourth toe is the worst offender, as it harbors a piece of sweatlogged jam bigger than your head. This lump you have to actually bite and chew, giving you time to truly savor the awful, bitter reek.
When the trial is done, you collapse and try to take your mind off of the bursting fullness of your stomach, and the sour aftertaste in your mouth. Your rest is interrupted by Jen’s booming, mocking voice.
“Nu-uh little guy! You’ve still got another pretty foot to clean up!”
She dangles her sole above you, letting you take in al the dirt and sweat. It’s going to be a long day.
When you finally finish with Jen’s other foot, you feel completely immobilized, and about ready to vomit all the disgusting crud you’ve just consumed. Yet even now, Jen refuses to let you rest.
“Oh, did my big feet make the little guy sick? Well here’s another deal for ya. If you don’t splurge all those hard-earned morsels, I’ll keep you alive. If not…splat!” She giggles.
152212.title: A much-deserved meal

choices: Jen puts her feet up on the examining table
The sandal drops on top of you
15222.content:
Jen’s foot suddenly disappeared from its imposing position above you, as Jen grabs the sandal and begins to lift it up. The insole tilts and you begin to slide toward the tow of the shoe. Desperate not to fall, you manage to grab one of the straps, but your hold is not as secure as it could be.
Jen brings the sandal up to her face, and your grip fails right before she can catch a glimpse of you. Undignified, you plummet, bounce against her lap, and lay sprawled on the examining table. While uninjured, your fall was far from soft and you’re still disoriented. While you’re trying to get your bearings…
15222.title: Jen lifts your sandal

choices: You shrink to a fraction of a millimeter
You shrink to a quarter inch
1523.content:
As if your situation wasn’t already disorienting enough, the gargantuan feet hanging above you suddenly swing out and down as Jen herself gets off the examining table. Her bare soles slap against the linoleum floor with an earth-shaking thud, easily knocking you off your feet. You watch in awe as the towering, feminine figure thuds away from you, more skyscraper than human. It takes you far too long to realize she is heading toward the shrinking machine. Jen begins to investigate the blinking, humming contraption.
Realizing the inherent danger, you begin to sprint toward her. You’re hopes of getting Jen’s attention before its too late are low, but you try anyway. You scream as you run, desperate to draw her away from poking at the machine. But you’re not quite loud enough.
1523.title: Shrink ray mishap

choices: Jen wiggles her toes and knocks you down between her toes
The machine malfunctions and shrink you yet again!
15231.content:
The shock of the size change is less severe this time, but you’re still blind and disoriented by it. When you regain your vision, you see an apparently endless plain of white stone or plastic, extending in all directions. The surface is smooth, and the sky above it is a hazy, yellow-grey. Enormous dark shapes hang in the distance, as large and indistinct as far-away mountains. You realize that two of these shapes are Jen’s sandals. They look more like geological features than articles of clothing.
The machine had already been set to shrink its target by a factor of about 80, and the repeated exposure now put you at about a third of a millimeter in height. Of course, you were in no position to make this estimation yourself.
You feel tremors through the ground as one of these shapes begins to grow. To get closer. You’re stomach sinks as you realize Jen is coming toward you.
Her watch as her planetary legs approach, her footsteps alone causing the ground to lurch and shudder beneath you. You are entirely immobilized by the quaking and are left to helplessly stare up as her slender foot eclipses the light and comes thundering down, faster than anything that size should travel.
It lands with an intense impact, nearly killing you with the shockwave alone. You lie between her slender toes, in a narrow valley made of toe flesh. Before you have much time to process the sight, Jen lifts her foot again. Your dust particle body is carried along with it, buoyed by the wind generated by Jen’s moving foot.
For several moments you are left to dangle in the air, disoriented and confused, before you slam into a firm surface.
Looking around, you notice the fleshy whorls and grooves that adorn the sticky, doughy ground. You’re also struck by the intense, sour, unmistakable aroma.
You’re on one of Jen’s toes.
15231.title: You shrink to a fraction of a millimeter

choices: Jen puts on some sneakers and goes for a jog to blow off steam
Jen puts on slippers and stays home
152311.content:
If the smell had been disgusting before, it was otherworldly at this scale. The air felt syrupy, so thick with raunchy foot stink that it burned your nose and tongue and made your eyes water. The film of clammy sweat was now a thick slime of salty gunk nearly knee deep. You try to trudge through it but the drying sweat acts as an adhesive sticking you to Jen’s big toe. Looking around, you notice a few other particles of dirt also stuck to the huge appendage, most larger than yourself.
There is a blur of motion and your insignificant body is suddenly free of the sweaty mire. Unfortunately, you land right back in another one.
This time, the grooved plain of Jen’s toe has been replaced with a mind-bending landscape of flesh-colored skyscrapers rising on both sides. It quickly becomes clear you’ve landed between Jens’ big and second toe.
The smell here is somehow even worse, a sharper tang of sour vinegar hanging in the air and stinging your nose. The sweat here is fresher, more liquid, but also deeper. You find yourself up to your shoulders, and some of the repugnant, salty stuff naturally spills into your panting mouth. To make matters worse, the environment between Jen’s toes is impossibly hot and muggy.
In the hazy distance, you can see her immense toes wiggle and twitch, and watch as specks of dirt ten times your size are ground into the soggy flesh between them. After an especially vigorous wiggle, you find yourself swept up and washed onto the collecting toejam.
For several minutes, you are helplessly stuck to the dark lump of toe gunk. No matter how hard you struggle, the stickiness of the sweat keeps you bound to it. Long after you’ve given up and accepted your fate at Jen’s feet, there is a moment of disorienting motion, and you witness the terrifying sight of a black leather strap barreling toward you.
Jen is putting her shoes back on.
Thankfully, the strap stops just short of your speck of toejam, saving you from annihilation. However, as Jen begins to walk, you begin to wish it hadn’t.
Jen herself is mildly annoyed that the podiatrist failed to show. She complains briefly to the receptionist before starting the walk back home. Hell of a day not to make an appearance, she thought. I guess I’ll just live with this for a while longer.
A hell of a day it certainly was. It was the height of summer, toeing the one-hundred-degree line, and humid too. Generally not great for Jen.
And especially not great for you. Now stuck in the relative darkness imposed by Jen’s sandal strap, you have nothing to think about but the rank smell and dizzying motion. By the time Jen got home, you were on the verge of losing consciousness, and almost covered in accumulated foot gunk and dirt. Every breath was through a sputtering film of fresh sweat.
Jen removed her sandals, grinding her damp toes into the carpet. You feel almost no difference, buried as you are in toejam.
152311.title: Adventures of Speck Man

152312.content:
Again the Shrinkomatic fires up, and again you are blinded, but only momentarily. When you open your eyes, the world is changed yet again. You find yourself slowly sinking into a somewhat viscous ooze. You try to pull your legs out of it, only to find yourself basically immobilized. It begins to dawn on you that you are slowly sinking into a veritable ocean of Jen’s sweat.
It is about then that the smell hits. To your heightened senses, it is no longer recognizable as foot odor, instead better classed as an actual chemical weapon. You take a few, progressively weaker huffs of the poison air before falling unconscious. Your limp body sinks ever deeper into the clammy sweat sea, and before long, it is just another gradually dissolving particle of dust in the endless expanse of your patient's toe.
152312.title: The machine malfunctions and shrink you yet again!

choices: Jen waits for a while before putting her shoes back on
Jen plays with you at her toes for a but before realizing something is there
15232.content:
The shock of the size change is less severe this time, but you’re still blind and disoriented by it. When you regain your vision, you immediately notice that everything around you are even more wildly oversized. You collapse to the ground in despair. Far above you, Jen finishes toying with the machine and heads back to the examining table.
The linoleum quakes and you look up to see her approaching. Jen was a tall woman even before your unfortunate mishap, coming in at well over six feet. From your current, ground-hugging point of view, she was absolutely gargantuan. Easily taller than a skyscraper, if a skyscraper could walk.
As she gets really close, you have to crane your neck to look at her. The thud of her footsteps has become downright seismic. Caught up in the sheer desperation of the situation, you make no attempt to get out of the way, and calmly await your fate.
Jen’s foot lands on you with an immense crash. By some miracle, you’ve ended up under the canopy of her toes. You’re so small that the fleshy ceiling provides a respectable amount of headroom.
Though physically unharmed, you find yourself inundated by the thick miasma of Jen’s foot odor. The smell here is so strong that you can quite literally taste it, the sweat condensing on your skin in a stifling film. The mounting heat doesn’t help either.
Suddenly, Jen moves again, this time taking you with her. The megalithic toes wrap around your body and lift you up, squeezing all the air out of you. By the time you recover, she’s set her feet up on the examining table, leaving you stranded on the vertical cliff face of her sole. Around you, the immense pillars of her toes twitch and wiggle, bathing you in their nauseating aroma. The sour, cheesy air is several times worse than it would be at a normal size, amplified by your scale and proximity to the source. You have to fight to breath without gagging.
15232.title: You shrink to a quarter inch

choices: Get to the sole of the shoes and figure it out from there
Stow away on Jen's massive.foot for now
152321.content:
Suddenly you hear a very loud sound that seems to be Jen's voice accompanied by a slight vibration even all the way down here at her feet, "UGH, IS THIS DUMB OLD DOCTOR EVER GOING TO SHOW UP? I MIGHT ASWELL LEAVE NOW AND SAVE MYSELF SOME TIME."
Before you can protest Jen begins her stride towards her shoes reaching them in seconds, you desperately try to unstick yourself from the underside of her toes but the drying sweat has you stuck like glue.
Looking around for some means of escape you notice Jen putting her ankle sock on her other shoe and realise, you are stuck with Jen's colossal sweaty foot for the foreseeable future if you don't get off soon.
Almost as if on cue Jen's fingers expand the opening of her sock and bring it at superhuman speeds towards the foot and by extention you, the entrance of the sock engulfs you and plunges you into darkness, in seconds the sock is fully on and your fate is sealed.

Your world is tilted onto it's side and then up again when Jen begins walking to a bench to put her shoes on, each time making you more and more nauseated, when she finally stops you are on the verge of vomiting but your heart sinks when what little light you had is blocked out by what you know to be Jen's shoe.
After a few seconds the familiar feeling of you being tilted to the side and back returns as you realise that you are on your way to Jen's house likely never to return, you breathe in to sigh but you remember where you are as the the warm thick air reeks of sweat and old cheese, a smell you will soon have to get used to.

Still adjusting to Jen's foot stench you begin to slip free as Jen's feet begin to sweat, your back is soon drenched in the disgusting liquid but it is freeing you nonetheless, you fall off of Jen's foot and land on her brown stained sock obviously not washed for days.
Your celebration is short lived however as suddenly you are faced with a dilemma, Jen is likely to wash her socks at some point so you can't stay on them, you could attempt to get through her disgusting sock to her shoe and go from there, or you could go back and climb the god-like foot and attempt to survive on it for however long it takes for her to take her socks off...
152321.title: Jen waits for a while before putting her shoes ...

choices: Jen is apologetic, but insists you carry on with the examination.
Jen shows her sadistic streak and shoves you in her bag
15233.content:
The shock of the size change is less severe this time, but you’re still blind and disoriented by it. When you regain your vision, you are relieved to notice that you now seem to be taller. You don’t waste a moment, and get back to drawing Jen’s attention.
This time, your efforts get results. Jen look up from her musings with the strange machine, surprised, and quickly catches sight of the doll-sized figure shouting on the clinic floor. She leans in to have closer look.
Jen is impressively tall even among the normal-sized, but at your size, her size is hard to come to terms with. You’ve never seen something the size of a building move that quickly. It’s disorienting.
Jen leans in to examine you more closely. Her terribly pale skin is accentuated by the absolute black of her hair, and her shocked stare only serves to further disquiet you. Despite that, you yell up to her, explaining your misfortunes.
15233.title: You grow to six inches

choices: Drops her Insoles on Top of You
153.content:
In walks Courtney your first patient of the day stepping through the doorway expecting you to take a look at her feet. the first thing you notice as she walks through the doorway is her worn out red and white Nike Track shoes that she always wears what seems like all the time even when shes not running for her high school track team. shes also wearing a white T-shirt and light purple gym shorts and she has her blond hair tied behind her head kind of like in a bun.

Your staring up at her finely toned legs when you dont even notice the front of the rubber sole of her sneaker coming right at you and kick you forward towards the examining chair that shes going to sit down in. you land in front of the chair and almost get crushed when she takes off each shoe and drops it a few inches away from you, before taking out each of her insoles and and holding them in her hand while she sits down with her bare feet in front of you.

You Remember when she first started coming here when she was 15 and you asked her how come she didnt wear socks. Courtney said "I dont know really, i always kinda thought it was bad luck to wear socks when i went to a track meet and ever since then I hardly wear socks at all. I know it makes my feet smell bad but its not like anybody has to smell them or anything like that." Now your staring up at the giant soles in front of you and your the one who has to endure the smell coming from each foot.

Courtney is starting to lean forward in her seat and she does what?
153.title: Courtney, Blonde Track Star

choices: She shakes it and you are sent flying somewhere in the room
1531.content:
While your covering your nose from the smell of her feet, Courtney leans forward and drops her worn out insoles on the floor coincidentally right on top of you. they are not that heavy enough to cause you any pain but you still cant lift them off of you at your puny size. the worst part however is the smell coming from them, they smell even worse than both of Courtneys feet combined probably because shes had them for so long, most likely for years.

As Courtney lounges in the chair waiting for you to arrive in the room and change her insoles, she has no idea of the small doctor pinned underneath her giant footwear accessory. these insoles are so worn out you can see every detail and the entire imprint of her foot is pressed into insole so much that you can see a giant canyon near the heel part and each imprint of her toes.

You think your beginning to pass out, not from the weight but from the stench of never washing her shoes before. right when you think your going to black out from years of foot sweat being poured into her insoles you feel it being lifted up into the air with you stuck to it and then....
1531.title: Drops her Insoles on Top of You

choices: She feels something on her Toe
She kicks her Feet in the Air
15311.content:
Courtney lifts up her insoles with you stuck to them and begins to lower them back into her shoes. you see your being lowered into her sneakers and struggle with all your might to peel yourself off and you are successful. good, but not that good, you look down and see that you are falling straight down towards her toes. you fall forever until you land right in beween her big and second toe and she squeezes them together trapping you in betweeen them.

If you thought her insoles smelled bad, you realize her feet stink even worse and being grinded between her toes is causing you a lot of discomfort. for 15 minutes your stuck here until she rolls over to lay on her stomach and you are turned upside down with only your head sticking out between her big and second toe lookig towards the heel and arch of her smelly foot.

You dont know how much time has passed but being stuck smelling this blond teenagers smelly feet has got to be the worst experience of your life if only she could feel your struggles on her foot than maybe she could possibly see you and hopefully not just think your a piece of lint. the next move Courtney makes is....
15311.title: You Fall inbetween her Toes

153111.content:
Courtneys toes are awful long for a girl her age and this isnt good for you because the more she wiggles her toes, the more you get rubbed up and down with a face full of sweaty big toe flesh. suddenly your hopes are lifted when she says "Whats that on my toe?" and her hand knocks you off back down to her insole but things only get worse as she picks them up and puts them back into her worn out red and white Nike Track shoes with you now trapped inside.


She puts her feet back in her shoes and you see the familiar toes moving back in their home and ensnaring you once again in between them. Courtney gets up and walks to the waiting room while each step for you feels like a smelly roller coaster ride with a front row seat in between her digits. Courtney says "Hey Dallas, ill be back later im just gonna go for a walk until Doctor Smith gets back." Dallas says "Oh? hes not in there? I could have sworn I saw him walk in there earlier this morning.....its like he just disappeared." neither girl knew of your entrapment inside the teenage girls sneaker and it looked like it would stay like that for a while. Courtney walks to the.....
153111.title: She feels something on her Toe

choices: Courtney Decides to play with you right away
Courtney decides to play later, and leaves you in her room
1532.content:
Courtney is sitting in the examination chair, humming along to the song playing from her iPod. You are standing in front of her huge, smelly, bare feet, and while you don't really move, Courtney all of a sudden looks directly at you, and begins staring. You freeze completely, and think of running, but before you can start, Courtney reaches down with what seems like lightning speed to you at your current size, and using her thumb and forefinger, she grabs you. You get a horrible feeling of vertigo as you are lfited up to her eye level, and as she holds you up to her face, you almost throw up. You see her blond hair, and her lucious red lips, and she begins to speak. She keeps the presence of mind to speak softly, so it is still incredibly loud to you, but it doesn't burst your eardrums.

"So, what do we have here hmmm," Courtney says, with an amused tone in her voice. "Why are you such a small size doctor? It seems like with feet, you'd hardly need to get to this small of a size to examine them properly. I think that you just shrunk yourself to spy on me, the poor helpless little 16 year old girl. I see your attempts to protest, but don't bother, because it's the only feasable explanation, and besides, I'm going to torture you now, a sick pervert like you deserves to be punished. You are now my possesion, my plaything until I get bored of you, and then, I'll dispose of you however I see fit at the time."

You just hang there in her fingertips, stunned. Courtney isn't even going to give you a chance to explain your situation. She begins to speak again.

"So, is it beginning to sink in now? Good. The only problem is, I wouldn't have much time to play with you now, because your secretary will need to talk to you sometime, plus, youro ther appointments might show up. So, I'm going to take you home, and play with you there. So, in you go!"

With that, Courtney puts you inside of her purse, next to some old tissues and a thing of lipstick. She slips her shoes back on, and walks out of the office, giving Dallas a wave as she goes. Courtney makes sure her purse is secure on her arm, and then begins jogging home, causing her bare feet to sweat inside of her shoes. After a twenty minute jog, she finally gets home, and kicks off her shoes, before running to her room, where she shuts and locks the door. The purse is thrown onto the bed, sending you tumbling around.
1532.title: Going Home with Courtney

choices: Lick her feet as she tells you to
15321.content:
Courtney pulls you out of her purse, and sets you on her bed.

"Don't go anywhere, I'll be right back!" Courtney says gleefully, before running out of her bedroom. The first thought that pops into your head is to run away, and hide. 15432.content:
Just as you were about to step forward and make yourself know so that your patient could hopefully help you out of this mess, the familiar sound of the door clicking behind you brought you hope. You turned around, hoping to tell Dallas to get the machine going, only to see Jessica, Caroline's daughter. As she kneeled to set down her athletic duffel bag and slipped off her backpack, her eyes made contact with yours. Smirking and closing the door behind her, leaning against it as she listened to her mother.

"School's over already? I must've been here forever already...I wonder what's keeping him. Have you seen him out there?" She swung her legs off the table to get up as Jessica tried to conceal a laugh through a cough. "What? He should be here already. I pay good money out of pocket to get these feet taken care of and he should be here on time. I am, ooh when I get a hold of him, he's going to get an earful. It's not my feet is it? They're not that bad."

Her daughter bent over laughing, which didn't help the situation at all. "What?! They're really not, and besides he's a foot doctor. If they are bad, he should suck it up. He knew what he was getting into."

"Well mom, have you ever caught a whiff of your toes on a bad day? Where do you think I got these feet from?" Jessica scrunched her toes in her boots, now recovering from her laughter. "And I have seen him, he must be super eager to help your feet out now that he's heard that conversation." She nodded in your direction, causing her mom to gasp before laughing out the awkwardness of the situation.

Caroline beamed as she stepped over to where your cowering form was on the floor. "Is this how they're doing foot massages now? Are you going to be like a little toy under my feet, massaging away all my troubles?" You fell backwards in your attempts to distance yourself, trying desperately to tell her that that was not the case at all. You tried yelling that you needed help and that her foot could crush you into dust, but she just smiled. "Oh you are, you're going to be the best toy for these aching soles."

She raised her foot high above you, and you gazed up in terror at her red, irritated, long and wrinkly soles as they came down upon you. Petrified you couldn't even scream as she pinned your head between her big toe and its neighbor, lifting you high up as she carried you back to the floor beneath the table she originally sat on. Now stuck under her gargantuan foot, you had no choice but to be kneaded and pushed into the ground by her damp, leathery toes as some kind of massage tool. Caroline leaned back, bracing her arms on the paper sheets and leaning her head back.

"Oh my god Jessica you have to try this, it's so much more than just your average massage. I can feel his little arms and legs flailing against my arches and its just beating away at the stress." Despite your pain, for some unfortunate reason, nothing was breaking and you weren't a smear against the sterile tiles of your office. The density of your body must've stayed consistent despite your mass changing. The science behind it wasn't coming to your head entirely clearing, albeit it was trying very hard not to be smashed into the floor like a grape, but the fight was quickly taken out of your tiny form. Due to the pin she had your head in, your mouth had no choice but to service the deep crevasses of her toes, where reeking piles of sock lint and toe jam awaited to be feasted upon by your unwilling mouth. Between screams and cries for help, you swallowed all too much of this and it was a long while until Caroline, in her overjoyed state, accidentally loosened her grip, sending you flying across the room.

Jessica, much like her mother, was all too amused with the situation. She went to go retrieve your crumpled form, which had fallen underneath your chair, and the door cracked open again. Jessica was quick to jump in front of you, concealing her prize from anyone who'd be willing to help, but you knew from the voice your only savior had stumbled in. It was Dallas.

"Is everything alright in here? It's beginning to get quite loud out here, is there anything we can do to keep the sound down?" Poor Dallas didn't know what she was getting into, as Caroline still had the earful she prepared for you from earlier.

"Do you know how long we've been waiting in here? We have things to do. I have to go get a hair cut and I'm sure Jessica here has practice to go to. I pay good money to go here, but I can easily change facilities. Do you want that? Where is my doctor? And I don't want just any doctor, no don't even think of sending in some half rate random doctor because you feel bad that we haven't had service yet. I want my doctor and stat. You know, I have half a mind to go find the administrator and tell him just how lackluster my day has been in here." She got up to really get in her face, but your poor nurse retreated in a flurry of apologies and weak promises, closing the door with a click. Perhaps that click was the click that just sealed your fate to these two cruel women.

"And that Jessica, is how you get your way." She sighed a happy sigh and gazed down at where you were, and smiled a wicked grin. "Say, it was your eighteenth last week. How about a late birthday present?"

Jessica slowly turned around, "Mom, you can't be serious. That's too much."

"No, don't be silly. We'll share him. Now, I think this machine is what shrunk him. Should we pop him up a bit or shrink him or what do you want sweety? It is your present after all."


Her daughter scooped you up, examining you squirm in her hands "Hmm, maybe this is a bit too small. Let's make him a foot tall, a foot for a foot." They both laughed too hard over that joke "That way, we can't lose him, but he's also great under the feet. Maybe we could even teach him a few chores." She threw you over to Caroline, who narrowly avoided missing you, and she propped you up on the machine and started fiddling with the buttons.

After a minute or so, the pain came back, cause you writhe and scream in agony while you went back to blacking out. Almost immediately, you woke back up, but now on the floor and being half dragged, half carried by Jessica, who only stopped to open her athletic duffle bag. Instantly, a vile smell filled the small room, and you saw sneakers and worn out socks filled the beaten bag. Now being bigger, you struggled, catching your captor off guard. Quickly, you crawled away from her without remembering that Jessica was standing in front of the only entrance. Instead you just scurried right into the grasp of Caroline, who kicked you over and smothered you with her long feet, pinning you so that her daughter could get a better grip on you. You broke free of her musty feet only to have Jessica firmly grab you.

With one hand on either of your ankles, she pulled and flipped you into the bag, zipping it up despite your renewed struggles. No matter where you turned in their, there was a strong smell to oppose you. Your head first fell underneath a small mound of ragged, crusty gym socks, which caused you to thrash for only a moment before they were able to completely sap your tiny body of strength. You lied under there, seething and sniffing the soaking, moldy stench of Jessica's hard work. For safe measure though, the two of them stood on either side of the bag, kicking it in mad glee just to make sure they could smuggle you out in silence. In the dark prison of the bag, the kicks rained like angry meteors, shaking up the smell and items so that your misery could only increase as shorts and tennis shoes joined the fray atop your face.

Caroline opened the door as Jessica slipped her backpack back on. Then with substantial effort, she managed to lift the duffel up off the ground and into the waiting room. Her mom first stopped by Dallas's outpost, making sure she knew that they were leaving as they could stand the lack of attention to their patients. A bewildered nurse turned and stared, able to do nothing as the two women walked out, one slightly twitching athletic bag in tow.

You could hear the large mechanical doors open as they wandered out into the parking lot, accompanied by the sound of a trunk popping, where you were loaded in unceremoniously . Amid the excited chatter of the two, what did you hear.
